item.title: Edit Multiple Lines at Once With Vim
item.description: In this post I want to explain how to sort the lines of a csv file while keeping related lines close to one another. My friends organize and promote a mathematics competition called OMEG. Every year I help them to keep the list of its participants up to date. It’s a csv file whose fields have the following meaning: inep code, full name and exam level (it’s an ordinal number, either 1, 2, or 3).
